Posts.Content: suzy129 wrote: hello there I had a routine mammogram and a lump was detected so had a biopsy waited 2 weeks results were inconclusive ,had a further deeper biopsy waited a further 2 weeks which was horrendous and the lump was benign .I cant tell you how I felt at this news im still on cloud 9  xx good luck to all of you waiting o results I hope your news is good xx   Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: waiting is over suzy129 Loulee
